data.actual_result: The message doesn't have any padding and is flush with the bottom of the message
data.expected_result: The message has padding on the bottom
data.short_description: "Only you can see this" message in clyde messages lacks bottom padding in cozy mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Do anything that will trigger a clyde message (Change your nickname through /nick, DM a user who blocked you, etc.) - Observe the "Only you can see this - delete this message" text
